What is Machine Learning?

Machine Learning (ML) is a subset of artificial intelligence that enables computers to learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed.

  • Supervised Learning
  • Unsupervised Learning
  • Reinforcement Learning
Algorithm TypeUse Case
Linear RegressionPredicting prices
Decision TreesClassification

Supervised Learning

Learning with labeled training data...

Unsupervised Learning

Finding patterns in unlabeled data...

Key Facts

  • ML algorithms can process vast amounts of data
  • Popular frameworks include TensorFlow and PyTorch
  • Used in recommendation systems, image recognition, and more
